headers.subject: [tosdr:2919] Twitch [Bad] On ToS Update notice not promised to be sent to users

subject: Twitch [Bad] On ToS Update notice not promised to be sent to users
text:
Twitch.tv Terms of Service
http://www.twitch.tv/user/legal?page=terms_of_service

> If Twitch changes these Terms of Service, we will provide notice of such changes, such as by sending an email, posting a notice on the Twitch Service or updating the “Last Updated” date above.

Twitch may or may not send a notice to users when changing the ToS.

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
